summary: THERE IS A RECALL ON MY CAR AND THERE IS NO FIX YET AND THE THIS CAR IS A TWO SEAT PERSON CAR AND I WHEN MY PARTNER SITS IN THE CAR THE AIRBAG DOES CUT ON AND THE WARNING LIGHT ALERTS ME THAT SERVICE AIRBAG. I CALLED GM THEY INFORMED ME THAT NOT HAVE SOME ONE SEAT UP FRONT, INFORMED THEM WHAT OTHER SEAT ARE THEY GOING TO SIT IN THEN. THEY INFORMED THEY COULD DISCONNECT THE ALARM:( WELL THAT IS GOING TO HELP MY PASSENGER WHICH I FEEL THAT THE CAR BEING SMALL IF I WAS TO CRASH THEY NEED THE PROTECTION FROM THE DASH AND THE TOP OF WINDSHIELD.     THE CONSUMER WAS AWAITING A FIX FOR RECALL 17V061 PUBLISHED IN JANUARY. THE CONSUMER BELIEVED THIS WAS AN UNREASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME HAS ELAPSED. THE CONSUMER WAS OFFERED TO HAVE THE AIRBAG DISCONNECTED.  UPDATED 09/11/2017*JS
